description.zh-CN: 深色皮革面板风格，采用径向渐变和皱纹纹理。通过皮革特性营造厚重奢华的视觉体验和高级感。皮革质感风格采用径向渐变、噪点纹理和缝线细节。营造厚重奢华的视觉体验，适合高端应用。
description.en-US: Dark leather panel style with radial gradients, noise textures, fine stitching details and metallic accents creating luxurious visual experiences. Perfect for premium applications, luxury brands, exclusive products, financial dashboards, high-end e-commerce platforms, luxury services, boutique applications, and sophisticated interfaces requiring tactile realism, elegant aesthetics, premium perception, and enhanced perceived value through authentic material simulation and truly exceptional visual quality refinement. enhancing premium perception and authentic material authenticity. Ensures exceptional design quality through strategic principles and thoughtful implementation. Enhances premium perception through authentic material representation and sophisticated tactile design.
